summary: Bochum is a city in the Ruhr area of the state of North Rhine-Westphalia in Germany.
full_text: Bochum  is a city in the state of North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany and part of the Arnsberg region. It is located in the Ruhr area and is surrounded by the cities  of Herne, Castrop-Rauxel, Dortmund, Witten, Hattingen, Essen and Gelsenkirchen. With a population of nearly 365,000, it is the 16th most populous city in Germany.
title: Bochum
